mapper.select: SELECT T.*, S.S_NAME, S.S_ADDRESS, S_DETAILADDRESS FROM TESTING T LEFT JOIN STORE S ON T.S_NO = S.S_NO LEFT JOIN WINELIST WL ON S.S_NO = WL.S_NO ORDER BY T.T_IDX DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TESTING (T_IDX, T_TITLE, T_CONT, W_NO, T_DATE, T_COST, S_NO) SELECT (NVL(MAX(T.T_IDX), 0) + 1), #{t_title}, #{t_cont}, #{w_no}, #{t_date}, #{t_cost}, #{s_no} FROM TESTING T LEFT JOIN STORE S ON T.S_NO = S.S_NO LEFT JOIN WINE W ON T.W_NO = W.W_NO
mapper.select: SELECT J.U_NO, T.T_COST, T.*, S.S_NAME, S.S_ADDRESS, S.S_DETAILADDRESS FROM TESTINGJOIN J LEFT JOIN TESTING T ON J.T_IDX = T.T_IDX LEFT JOIN STORE S ON T.S_NO = S.S_NO LEFT JOIN WINE W ON T.W_NO = W.W_NO WHERE J.U_NO = #{u_no} ORDER BY T.T_IDX DESC
